akn:section.akn:heading: Reimbursements from State and local agencies

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 304111. Reimbursements from State and local agencies Subject to applicable conflict of interest laws, the Council may receive reimbursements from State and local agencies and others pursuant to agreements executed in furtherance of this division. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3214.)
